title: In triangle WXY, angle X cong angle W, YW = 19 and WX = 1 15. What is the length of XY? - Quora

response.answer_text: In triangle WXY, angle X cong angle W, YW = 19 and WX = 1 15. What is the length of XY? W = X => XY = WY = 19 However WX ca not be 115 since it can not exceed the sum of the other two sides i.e. WX < 38
